data.text: @PoppyHarlowCNN @POTUS @realDonaldTrump I am seriously SO RELIEVED that you and everyone at the NY Bureau are safe. You all were extremely impressive as you kept reporting through a story that you were very much in the middle of. As for POTUS remarks, he could have at least mentioned the media since he caused this.
@PoppyHarlowCNN @POTUS @realDonaldTrump What a surreal statement coming from him. I actually burst out laughing.
